welcome: Welcome! I am the advanced search bot.
🔹 `/asn AS15169` to search for domains related to an ASN.
join_group: Sorry, you must join our group first to use the bot: @{group_username}
specify_domain: Please specify a domain. Example: /scan google.com
specify_asn: Please specify an ASN. Example: /asn AS15169
searching_domain: 🔍 Performing a deep search for {target} subdomains... This may take some time.
error_searching: An error occurred during the search. Please try again.
too_many_results: The results are too numerous ({count} domains), they will be sent in a file.
